document_title: Spinal myeloma: Symptoms, causes, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content:
If not treated promptly, spinal cord tumors will cause many dangerous complications for the patient. Specifically, the sequelae that people with spinal cord tumors face include:
Movement disorders; Limb paralysis or sphincter paralysis; Paralysis on one side of the body; Loss of heat and cold sensation; Permanent nervous system damage; Impaired bowel and bladder function
If the tumor compresses the spinal cord, it can be life-threatening.
People with spinal cord tumors may experience limb weakness
subsection_title: u tuy song.json. Is spinal cord tumor dangerous?
subsection_data:
